receivePlayRoadBuildingCardRequest(PlayRoadBuildingCard, boolean) - Method in class ServerProtocol
this method needs to check if the chosen streets are legal and handle accordingly - however, it is possible that the streets are legal only if checked in the reverted order - the second street is required for the first to be legal that's why this method needs to be called twice, once with street1, street2 and then with street2, street1

run() - Method in class networking.ServerConnectionHandler
 
run() - Method in class Server
defines the behavior of the server - it will wait for clients to connect, as soon as one of them does a connectionHandler is created for them and the communication between this client and server is handled in that connectionHandler
